it.sephiroth.android.library.uigestures

Class UITapGestureRecognizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.sephiroth.android.library.uigestures.UIGestureRecognizer
      • it.sephiroth.android.library.uigestures.UITapGestureRecognizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OnGestureRecognizerStateChangeListener, UIDiscreteGestureRecognizer

    public final class UITapGestureRecognizer
extends UIGestureRecognizer
implements UIDiscreteGestureRecognizer
    UITapGestureRecognizer looks for single or multiple taps. For the gesture to be recognized, the specified number of fingers must tap the view a specified number of times.
    Author:
    alessandro crugnola
    See Also:
    https://developer.apple.com/reference/uikit/uitapgesturerecognizer
